text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
――Air Groove is about 4 lengths behind! 
From the center, Air Groove pushes forward!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, that's right! And, just after this! The girls 
on the inside start moving to the outside, cutting off 
her path so she immediately moves to the outside……!
choice_data_list: She accelerated and passed them instantly!
She accelerated and passed them instantly!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, she did! It was an instant decision ignoring 
that her distance to the goal was longer! I wish 
I could be cool and run like that too――!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
As expected, Trainer-san gets it too! Um, do you 
want to watch another video together? Like this one……!
choice_data_list: Yeah! I remember this race too――
Yeah! I remember this race too――

text_block_list.text:
After that, Rhein Kraft and I passionately 
talked about the Tiara Uma Musumes' races. 
Her eyes were practically sparkling the whole time――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
……Yeah. 
I want to be like them too――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I want to be remembered. To reach them. 
To be connected to them, that's what I think.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
At first……it was just a feeling. Back home, on a hidden shelf 
there was some old racing footage. I think it was for the 『Oaks』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
And the Uma Musume running in it were so graceful 
and beautiful. I was mesmerized by their victory…… 
and that's how I got so interested in racing.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
And when I begged my parents, they eventually took me 
to see my first race in person, the 『Oaks』――and then!

text_block_list.name: Young Kraft
text_block_list.text:
(Huh? That's weird……it's the first time I've seen a real race…… 
but I know that girl's running! That pretty run――!)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Afterwards, I looked it up and found out. That Uma 
Musume was the same one that I admired from the 
first videos I saw……It felt like I learned from her.

text_block_list.name: Oaks Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
Everyone, thank you very much for cheering for me! 
This victory……I owe it all to the guidance from my instructor.

text_block_list.name: Oaks Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
I want to continue to run in the Tiara rotation so that someday, 
I can be like my instructor too. To pass on what I was taught, 
to become that link, that's the Uma Musume I want to be.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Just like the "Queen", her mother, is connected to 
the "Empress" Air Groove, it's just like that, right?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
It's just like the Tiara Uma Musume, one by one, 
are passing a baton on to the next generation…… 
they pass it on. And they become connected.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Compared to the Triple Crown Uma Musume, 
gradually carving their name as part of an 
era, it might not seem as grand. But even then――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
As a senpai, as a leader, or even as a mother. The Tiara Uma 
Musume have always created that connection with their own hands.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
From the girls that went before, to the girls 
that came after. They pass on that baton filled 
with emotions, and then it gets picked up again.
choice_data_list: An inheritance from the Tiara Uma Musume……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: ……Isn't that something wonderful? That's what I thought.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I want to be like that too. 
I want my run to reach someone, to connect――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
That someone will come along after me, 
and my running will be what I left to them.
choice_data_list: That's why you want the Tiara rotation
That's why you want the Tiara rotation

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. 
Those girls, and us are definitely strong. And so――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
There are things that only a Tiara Uma Musume can show us. 
And I believe there are things that only we can convey!

So straightforward……from the beginning that hasn't changed. 
After hearing her unwavering declaration――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Eh? Trainer-san――
choice_data_list: I can almost see it already
I can almost see it already

text_block_list.text:
I continued on. I wanted her to know. I needed 
to tell her. ……If she continued to honestly 
pursue her dream, just how much would she bloom?
choice_data_list: Can I help with your training?
Can I help with your training?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san……!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Yes. ……Yes please!! 
For the selection race, I look forward to it!!

We shook hands under the starry sky―― 
And so, the days of training with Rhein Kraft began.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Haaa, haaa, haaa……! I finished full power sprinting～～～……! 
And, next is light jogging……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Yeah……!! 
Haa, huu, huu, haaa……!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Huu, huu, grrrr～～～……!! 
Hnnnnnnnn……!!
choice_data_list: Don't let your knees move so far foward!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Haaaaaaaーーーーーーーーー!

text_block_list.name: Heart's Friend A
text_block_list.text:
Amazing～ today too……Rhein Kraft's training load is crazy! 
Seems like she's really really serious about the selection race……!

text_block_list.name: Heart's Friend B
text_block_list.text:
Well, well, you think? But there's no way our queen 
will lose. Right? She'd be no match for you, Heart!

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
No? Speaking honestly, like this she'd take the lead. 
Rhein Kraft isn't an opponent you can underestimate.

text_block_list.name: Heart's Friend B
text_block_list.text:
Eh, seriously!? Even for Heart she'd be a tough opponent……!? 
Then, then――

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
But that's if 『I stay the same as now』 though. 
……Isn't it great? I'm getting fired up!

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
Until the selection race, it just means I need to keep getting 
stronger. I won't hand the title of true queen over to anyone!

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
……Daring Heart-san seems like she'll be changing 
her training menu. How much stronger will she get 
until then? ……I need to revise my predictions.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
But, I can't get distracted. No matter what the 
other girls are doing……my intentions won't change.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
The strength of my mother, and the legacy I've inherited, 
I'll prove all of it. ――Without a doubt.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
And to do that, I must steadily, and reliably improve. 
One step at a time, just grow stronger……!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I'm backー. 
Fuaaah, I'm exhausted again today～……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: So you're back now, Kraft.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, sorry I was so late. Let's head to the cafeteria～…… 
wait, huh? Cesario, you're still switched on?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
So strict and unflinching! On mode right now……I was expecting 
the usual soft and sweet Off mode when we're in the dorms.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Fuu……――that's true. 
Normally that's how it is though.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
But right now, is not the time to be losing focus. Sorry, 
but you'll have to eat alone. I plan on running a bit more.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
……Kraft, have you noticed recently? That lately, 
the other girls are being influenced by your actions?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Eh, by me……?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. By your straightforward feelings for the Triple Tiara…… 
It's driving them forward. ――And I'm one of those people.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
But when it comes to that feeling. ……and your strength. 
I have no intention of falling behind, Rhein Kraft.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I'm also an Uma Musume aspiring for the Triple Tiara. 
I want to leave my name in the history of the Tiara as well――

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Someday, I'll be part of the foundation of 
that history. As such……I can't lose here.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
First, is the selection race. 
It's a challenge, Rhein Kraft――!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Cesario……!! 
……Yeah. I won't lose either!!
